dcterms:description: A real world multi-modal dataset comprising 2 radiology modalities (CT and MRI), histopathology, genomics, and clinical data from 618 patients with clear cell renal cell carcinoma (ccRCC). It includes benchmarks for predicting 12-month survival with varying degrees of missing data across modalities.
dcterms:title: MMIST-ccRCC

dcterms:creator: National Cancer Institute Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
dcterms:description: The Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium Clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma Collection (CPTAC-CCRCC) dataset includes radiology data (CT and MRI), histopathology data (WSI), clinical, and genomics data.
dcterms:title: CPTAC-CCRCC

dcterms:creator: O. Akin
et al.
dcterms:description: The Cancer Genome Atlas Kidney Renal Clear Cell Carcinoma Collection (TCGA-KIRC) dataset includes genomic and clinical data related to clear cell renal cell carcinoma.
dcterms:title: TCGA-KIRC

dcterms:creator: Kenneth Clark
Bruce Vendt
Kirk Smith
John Freymann
Justin Kirby
Paul Koppel
Stephen Moore
Stanley Phillips
David Maffitt
Michael Pringle
et al.
dcterms:description: The Cancer Imaging Archive (TCIA) is a public information repository that maintains and operates a large collection of cancer imaging data.
dcterms:title: The Cancer Imaging Archive (TCIA)
